channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report E-2024030440
item.description:
Report E-2024030440

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-25T15:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-21
  • City: DES MOINES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Approximately 2 cups of Flash Clene 1414, which released from a 275 gallon poly tote due to a broken/loose lid on the tote, causing it to slosh about during transit leak out. No Drains, Soils, or waterways were reported impacted.
